article_title: Congress Is Actually About to Get a lot Done
article_text:

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Steven T. Dennis

twitter.description:
Don’t look now, but Congress is actually about to get a lot done.
This week, newly minted House Speaker Paul Ryan touted mammoth highway and education deals as proof that he is delivering on ...
twitter.title: You Can’t Call It A Do Nothing Congress Anymore

article_metadata.keywords: congress, paul ryan, house speaker, no child left behind, budget deal, barack obama, white house, government shutdown
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Barack Obama, budget Deal, Congress, government shutdown, house speaker, No Child Left Behind, Paul Ryan, White House
article_metadata.description: Congress members have struck deals on mammoth highway and education bills. And there’s a push to make progress on the budget and taxes.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: You Can’t Call It A Do Nothing Congress Anymore
article_metadata.news_keywords: congress, paul ryan, house speaker, no child left behind, budget deal, barack obama, white house, government shutdown
